entry.title: The Future is Ahead of Us, Not Set in Stone
entry.summary:
Author: Zi_Xi_Zy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,007Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 324

Summary: In her final year of lycée, Marinette moves to Gotham for various reasons. Meanwhile, Damian Wayne, in his last year of high school, is ready to leave the Robin mantle behind and follow his own path away from his vigilante family.But as he steps away from one destiny, another reveals itself—one tied to the Miraculous, to the power of restoration, and to the girl who was never meant to wield the Ladybug Miraculous in the first place.When Marinette and Damian meet, it becomes undeniable: the roles they were forced into were never meant for them. She was born for the Black Cat. He was made for the Ladybug. And together, they must uncover the truth behind the Miraculous, the Order, and their own tangled legacies before it’s too late.

entry.title: The War of Balance
entry.summary:
Author: NightingaleRose2023

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,684Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 181

Summary: The League of Assassins has declared war against the Order of the Guardians, forcing the Miraculous Court, and their beloved leaders, Marinette and Damian, on a mission, a race against time, to recollect the remaining forgotten and missing miraculi around the globe.However, the aftermath of their previous war has created ripples...and with their current fight leading them far too close to a past life, worlds may collide. After all... The Al Ghul line will do anything to emerge victorious...(This is book two of my series, so for this story to make sense, please read book one before reading this one.)

Author: Am_I_really_a_writerhuh

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,156Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 176

Just. Sailed.”His brown eyes were suddenly wide open, all grogginess dispelled.“Details. entry.title: Beneath Dense Fog
entry.summary:
Author: ExperienceNewWorlds1

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,340Chapters: 16/16Kudos: 100

Summary: Marinette was alone. So, utterly alone. Her class and family had turned on her. Her partner was harassing her. And she couldn’t even get upset because Hawkmoth would akumatize her.Benjamin wasn’t expecting to find a girl curled up in a ball in some alleyway. He definitely wasn’t expecting to see a floating red TALKING creature trying to comfort her. New to Paris, Ben doesn’t quite understand the significance, but there’s no way a girl like that should be crying alone in an alley.And Damian certainly wasn't expecting to feel a small twinge in his chest when Marinette smiled at any other boy.

entry.title: Slipping Through Wishes
entry.summary:
Author: SentiWayne

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,572Chapters: 7/30Kudos: 61

Summary: In a world fraught with heroes and shadows, Marinette faces an inner conflict: should she embrace her role as a hero or succumb to the darker identity she has been molded into—a weapon in the hands of those in power? Slade’s grasp on this powerful tool is central to his plot against the Titans, but the stakes are higher than mere revenge. As Marinette aligns with a mysterious figure desperately looking for his father, they must navigate a treacherous path filled with complicated emotions and deep-rooted trust issues. Their alliance is strained by dangerous secrets that could unravel everything, and as their loyalties clash, the risk of losing each other looms ever larger. Will they find a way to reconcile their conflicting desires, or will hidden truths tear them apart forever?*Slow burn Daminette**Childhood friends; Enemies to friends to lovers; Villian x hero*

entry.title: Fate or Chance
entry.summary:
Author: Stephanie_Hearthlight

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 96,273Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 2,952

Summary: The sweet irony almost makes Marinette laugh.And to think that the little Parisian had to leave the city of love and reach the city of crime to find true love.Damian, on the other hand, didn't know who to blame.He only knew that he had fallen before the spell of that pair of blue eyes that did not come out of his mind, bringing light to the darkest city in America.Marinette is, despite being hurt, a kind heroine whose soul is as pure as an angel.Damien is generally sullen with everyone. A vigilante who learned what human relationships mean a little late. As fierce as a demon.None of them knows exactly how, but they find their other half in the least likely person.Fate, chance or ...?

entry.title: We Should have Stayed in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: skhwriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 100,547Chapters: 32/?Kudos: 8,588

Summary: The students of Gotham Academy were confused. It was International Friendship Week, and it was Gotham’s turn to host. Except no one wanted Gotham to host, not even Gotham! So the Directors of the Friendship Conference decided that it was in everybody’s best interest to skip the City of Crime and go straight to the City of Lights. Everyone thought that it was the perfect idea! Except for Paris. The Gothamites couldn’t help but laugh and scoff at the Parisians insistence that Gotham would be a much safer place than Paris, and nothing should change. And everyone, even one Damian Wayne, was thrilled when the petition went through, and they boarded the plane for Paris.And then…a giant baby…tried to eat the Eiffel Tower…they should have stayed in Gotham.

entry.title: mouse and robin
entry.summary:
Author: whoscountinganyway

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,484Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 60

Summary: After passing the chance to be Ladybug onto her new friend, Alya, Marinette Dupain-Cheng becomes the guardian of the miraculous and a less important hero, Mice, in order to watch over the miraculous court. It's a fitting job, even if she realizes at a certain point (insert Lila Rossi here:) she has to burn her friendships in order to protect everyone.One boy, a boy she texted on accident only to find great friendship with, stands the test of time. Damian Secret-Surname has her trust, which, in fact, is more important than her heart.*It's probably somewhere between Dupain-Cheng helping Jon stitch his favorite flannel back together with more practiced ease than even Pennyworth could manage and her helping Cassandra bake a chocolate cake for Father, walking out of the kitchen with a smear of chocolate batter beside her lips that Damian realizes he no longer wants to just be friends.And by Allah, Damian Wayne al Ghul is determined to find out if this attraction always goes both ways.

entry.title: No Pain in Death
entry.summary:
Author: Bastet_Case

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,531Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 558

Summary: In a world full of the supernatural, the Bat family are creatures of the night and protectors of both human and supernatural.When their lives brush those of Danny Fenton and Marinette Dupain-Cheng, they think little of the two seemingly unconnected teens from opposite sides of the world. But the young half ghost and guardian are two sides of a coin, chosen champions of life and death in a game they don’t yet know. And something from the shadows is hunting them both.Will the Bats realise they are needed before it’s too late?

entry.title: I don't need to see to find you
entry.summary:
Author: Assassinscred

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,638Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 1,842

Summary: Marinette and Damian were raised to be married one day. They were the culmination of two powerful bloodlines. He is the next head of the League of Assassins and she's the next Grand guardian of the miraculous.But great plans never hold up well under first contact with the enemy. With a coup and an acid attack, Marinette finds herself without the boy she grew up with, unable to see the world, and with a new family to teach her how to function without the use of her eyes while waiting to be called back to her betrothed's side.
